root.name: Stone Smash
root.description: Stone Smash is more-or-less a standard clone of Breakout-type games. The game contains a few cameos from CC SH characters.The initial game was released as freeware in 2005 for PC, and then in 2006 on the compilation disc CC SH: Smash Hits. A version for internet browsers released in March of 2013. Early work has begun on an Xbox Live Indie Games release as well as one for Atari 2600.

similar_games.game: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 14: The Block Kuzushi
